channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Threads is nearing X’s daily app users, new data shows
item.description: Threads' mobile app for iOS and Android saw 115.1 million daily active users, representing 127.8% year-over-year growth.

item.title: CoreWeave acquires data center provider Core Scientific in $9B stock deal
item.description: As a result of the deal, CoreWeave says it will gain access to more than a gigawatt of data center capacity — enough energy to power more than 850,000...

item.title: People Are Using AI Chatbots to Guide Their Psychedelic Trips
item.description: As psychedelic companies and therapy apps experiment with AI, people are already taking huge doses of drugs and using chatbots to process their trips.

item.title: Best Window Air Conditioners 2025: 10 Picks to Cool You for Years
item.description: These WIRED-tested AC units have been lodged into our windows and cooling our homes for months, if not years.

item.title: Waymo starts robotaxi testing in Philadelphia and NYC

item.title: 15 Best Air Purifiers (2025): Coway, AirDoctor, IQAir
item.description: Protect your home against dust, pets, allergies, and more with air purifiers tested firsthand by WIRED.

item.title: Why Jolly Ranchers Are Banned in the UK but Not the US

item.title: AI is forcing the data industry to consolidate — but that’s not the whole story
item.description: While AI may be the catalyst behind the recent wave of data company M&A, the market was ripe for consolidation.

item.title: 13 Best Wi-Fi Routers of 2025, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Don’t suffer the buffer. These WIRED-tested systems will deliver reliable internet across your home, whatever your needs or budget.

item.title: TikTok reportedly developing new version of app ahead of planned US sale
